headline: A Fresh Look at L3Harris Technologies’s (LHX) Valuation After Recent Outperformance
summary: L3Harris Technologies (LHX) shares have shown steady performance lately, gaining about 6% over the past month and 13% in the past 3 months. Investors appear interested in how the company’s ongoing initiatives might support its momentum. See our latest analysis for L3Harris Technologies. Momentum has really been picking up for L3Harris lately, with a robust year-to-date share price return of nearly 41%. That strength follows a long-term trend as well, with shareholders seeing a total return of...
